title: VS Ending Question
body:
I understand the event ends tonight at 23:59 PDT.  I understand I have until later in July to craft my loot so on and so forth.

My question is...can I still buy orbs from the store after the event ends tonight at 23:59 PDT?!

Thanks!

replies.body: Content specific to the Vs event like Orbs should no longer be available in the store once the event is over.  If you want Orbs, you'll want to get it asap because the event is nearly over!
